text: 3.25: FG 13.38-39; 17.30; Ef 1.7; Kor 1.20; Hi 9.15Fhe Bakɨme Zisas farasarigi, ana rimgip won vɨzɨna siasuarga, guigira ana khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, ana vɨzɨn mbe muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ruagiri, nta vhɨzgirga. Ana won tɨvar vhuun nza khɨvɨr zav maaŋ muuŋgi. Fhum, Fhe Bakɨme mbarara kha gumgi gu mbigi ga mbuav, ana mbe muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga nzuav vheza mbatɨgar mbe ndɨɨi fhuvara.
